Buying opportunity
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Farm and Monster Rancher Cards: Trading Post: Buying opportunity
By Thorr on Wednesday, March 5, 2008 - 07:47 am:

I am working on getting the remaining stock of Monster Farm Battle Card Series 1 Booster Boxes from an online retailer. If I can pull it off, I would be willing to resell the stock at my own cost.

If there are folks who may be interested in this, please post a note here. I'd like to get a gauge. If the store has a high volume of stock left, I may not be able to pick it all up unless I know I can resell some of it.
